news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Adoption Law Center
news.description: Expanding your family through adoption is exciting but can be daunting. Adoptive parents likely want to ensure that the process goes as smoothly as possible. The Adoption Law Center at Justia provides some general insights.

news.title: Shackled to Our Screens: How Technology Has Imprisoned the Legal Profession
news.description: When you think about how you spend your time nowadays, what do you imagine? Eight hours a day, five days a week where you are looking at a screen for just about the whole time? But what about the hours after? Are you sitting in front of a TV or computer when you are home and during the weekends? Are we, in essence, simply perpetually shackled to our screens?
